item.title: SCANIA S Longline 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 7, 2025

SCANIA S Longline 1.55 ETS2

The Scania S Longline is a popular truck mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), known for its extended cabin and unique appearance. The mod is highly sought after by players who enjoy long-haul trucking and a more customized, realistic experience.

Key Features of the Mod
Longline Cabin: The main feature of this mod is the extended “Longline” cabin, which is significantly longer than the standard Scania S, giving it a distinct and powerful look.
Customization: Mods like this typically offer a wide range of customization options, including different chassis configurations, engine options, interior accessories, and various cosmetic upgrades.
Realistic Elements: The best versions of this mod often include custom engine sounds, accurate physics, and detailed interior models to enhance the overall immersion.
Version 1.55: The “1.55” in the mod’s name indicates that it is specifically designed to be compatible with Euro Truck Simulator 2 version 1.55. Using a mod that is not updated for your game version can lead to crashes or other issues.

Here’s the general process for installation:
1. Download: Find a trusted source for the mod. Be careful of sites that may contain malicious software.
2. Extract the file: The downloaded file will likely be a `.zip` or `.rar` archive. You’ll need to extract the `.scs` file from it.
3. Place in the mod folder: Copy the `.scs` file into your ETS2 mod folder, which is typically located at `Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod`.
4. Activate in-game: Launch ETS2, go to the Mod Manager, and activate the Scania S Longline mod. Make sure to set its priority correctly, especially if you have other mods.
5. Enjoy: Once in the game, visit a Scania dealership to purchase and customize your new truck.

Credits: CAPIVARA

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: SCANIA 124G BICUDA v1.3 WS MODS 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 7, 2025

SCANIA 124G BICUDA v1.3 WS MODS 1.55 ETS2

The SCANIA 124G BICUDA v1.3 WS MODS (1.55) is a popular and highly-detailed mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), created by WS Mods. This truck is well-known in the Brazilian modding community and is valued for its authentic look and extensive customization.

Key Features of the Mod
This mod goes beyond a simple truck model, offering a full experience with unique parts and a realistic feel.
Customization: The mod includes a wide variety of parts, such as different cab configurations, spoilers, bumpers, and side skirts. It also features a “Bicuda” style, which is a classic long-nose design popular in Brazil.
Interior Details: The interior is often a highlight, with custom dashboards, animated antennas, and various accessories like GPS, a PS5, and a PX radio.
Sounds and Physics: The mod typically comes with a custom sound pack to provide an immersive experience, along with realistic physics for a more authentic driving feel.
Version Compatibility: The “1.55” in the name indicates that this specific version of the mod is compatible with Euro Truck Simulator 2 version 1.55.

How to Find and Install the Mod
1. Download: Once you find a reliable source, download the mod file. It will typically be a `.zip` or `.rar` file.
2. Extract the SCS file: Open the downloaded archive and extract the `.scs` file inside. This is the file you’ll need for the game.
3. Move the File: Copy the `.scs` file into your ETS2 mod folder, which is located at `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`.
4. Activate in-game: Launch ETS2, go to the Mod Manager in your profile, find the SCANIA 124G mod, and activate it. Make sure it’s at a high priority, especially if you’re using other mods.
5. Start Driving: Go to a truck dealer (usually the “Mod Dealer” in-game) to purchase and customize your new truck.

Credits: WS

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Next Generation Scania 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 7, 2025

Next Generation Scania 1.55 ETS2

The term “Next Generation Scania” in the context of Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2) generally refers to the Scania S and R series trucks that were introduced into the game as part of a major update. These trucks are highly popular among players, and as a result, there are many community-created mods to enhance them.

These mods go beyond the standard game features, offering a wealth of new parts and options to make your truck unique.

Common “Next Generation Scania” Mods
P, G, R, and S Series Reworks: A very common type of mod, often created by modders like Eugene, completely overhauls the base game’s Scania S and R series. These mods often add the smaller P and G series cabs, new chassis options (including rigid chassis for box trucks), and a huge variety of tuning parts that aren’t in the base game.
Custom Dashboards and Interiors: These mods focus on making the interior more realistic and customizable. You can find mods that change the font on the dashboard for better readability, add real-life accessories like GPS or radios, and introduce new textures for the steering wheel and seats.
Engine Sounds: Sound mods are a huge part of the ETS2 modding scene. For the Next Gen Scania, you can find mods that replace the default sounds with much more realistic recordings of the Scania DC13 (inline 6) or the powerful V8 engines. These can dramatically improve the feeling of driving the truck.
Tuning and Accessory Packs: These mods are all about adding more ways to customize your truck. They often include new bumpers, side skirts, exhaust pipes, roof horns, sunshields, and other small details that let you create a unique look for your truck.

How to Install and Use These Mods
The process for installing most ETS2 mods is straightforward:
1. Download and Extract: Download the mod file. It will typically be a `.zip` or `.rar` archive. You need to extract the `.scs` file from it.
2. Place the File: Copy the `.scs` file into your ETS2 mod folder, which is located in your documents folder: `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`.
3. Activate in-game: Launch ETS2, go to the Mod Manager, and activate the mod. If you have multiple mods, pay attention to the load order and priority to avoid conflicts.
4. Customize Your Truck: Visit a Scania dealership in the game to purchase or modify the truck with all the new parts.

Credits: PANCO

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: ONIBUS g4 Scania 6×2 DC3D 1.55 ETS2
item.description:
Euro Truck Simulator 2 Mods | American Truck Simulator Mods | August 7, 2025

ONIBUS g4 Scania 6×2 DC3D 1.55 ETS2

The ÔNIBUS G4 SCANIA 6×2 is a popular bus mod for Euro Truck Simulator 2 (ETS2), and the version from DC3D is particularly well-regarded in the Brazilian modding community. This mod is a favorite for players who enjoy driving classic Brazilian buses.

The “G4” refers to the Marcopolo Generation 4, an iconic model of bus, and the “SCANIA 6×2” indicates the chassis and engine configuration. The “1.55” specifies that this mod is designed to work with version 1.55 of ETS2. DC3D is a well-known modding group that often creates high-quality, detailed models of Brazilian vehicles.

Key Features of this Mod
Detailed Model: DC3D mods are typically known for their attention to detail, so you can expect a well-modeled exterior and a realistic interior with custom textures.
Customization: Bus mods usually come with a variety of customization options. You can expect to change things like the paint, wheels, interior accessories, and even add custom skins from real-world bus companies.
Engine and Sounds: The mod should include a custom Scania engine and a realistic sound pack to give you an authentic driving experience.
Passenger System: Many bus mods, especially those compatible with newer versions of ETS2, include a passenger system that allows you to take on and drop off passengers, adding a new layer of gameplay.

How to Get and Install the Mod:
Mods like this are often distributed through third-party websites or are sold as premium mods on platforms like DC3D’s own site.

Here’s the general process for installation:
1. Download: Find a reliable source for the mod. Be cautious of unofficial download sites, as they may contain malicious files.
2. Extract the file: The mod will likely be a compressed file (`.zip` or `.rar`). You need to extract the `.scs` file from it.
3. Copy to the mod folder: Place the `.scs` file into your ETS2 mod folder, which is located in `Documents/Euro Truck Simulator 2/mod`.
4. Activate in-game: Launch ETS2, go to the Mod Manager, and activate the bus mod. Make sure its priority is set correctly, especially if you have other mods or maps.
5. Start your journey: Once in the game, you can purchase the bus from a truck or mod dealer and start driving.

Keep in mind that with bus mods, you may also need a compatible map mod or a passenger mod to fully utilize all the features, especially the passenger transport system.

Credits: DC3D RLG3D

How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods
In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
Report bugs in the comments and help modders improve this mod. Always check the comments, you can find a solution.

DOWNLOAD MOD
